Proxy.name: MapperBase
Proxy.Documentation: Defines interface defined by vtkMapper. Don't instantiate directly.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping even when scalars are unsigned chars. Otherwise, when upto 4 component unsigned chars are present, they will be directly used as colors.

SourceProxy.name: ImageSliceMapper
SourceProxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkImageMapper. We may need to change this to be a proxy for a new class, vtkPVImageMapper which can use different point data attributes as scalars in the image.

IntVectorProperty.name: Slice
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current slice number. Slice number is used to load a 2D slice from a 3D input image. If the input image is 2D, then the slice number if ignored. The direction of the slice is determined by SliceMode.

IntVectorProperty.name: SliceMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines the direction of slicing to obtain a 2D slice from a 3D image.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set if scalar mapping must be used even when the input image data scalars are unsigned chars i.e. they can be directly rendered as color.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalarMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select where to find the scalars.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the name for the scalar array.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup table to use for scalar mapping.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping even when scalars are unsigned chars. Otherwise, when upto 4 component unsigned chars are present, they will be directly used as colors.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseXYPlane
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the image slice is always rendered in the XY plane (Z==0) irrespective of the image bounds. Default if Off.

ImageTextureProxy.name: ImageTexture
ImageTextureProxy.Documentation: This is a proxy for a vtkTexture which also includes an image file reader. This reader can read an image of client/data server or render server and then transmit it to the client/render server where it will be used for texturing.

Proxy.name: TextActor
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for a text actor. Not to be used directly.

Proxy.name: ActorBase
Proxy.Documentation: Defines interface for an actor. Don't instantiate this proxy itself.

BoxRepresentationProxy.name: BoxRepresentation
BoxRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkBoxRepresentation. Don't confuse this with the vtkSMRepresentation proxy for the box widget (which is the BoxWidgetRepresentation).

Proxy.name: SphereRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkSphereRepresentation. Don't confuse this with the vtkSMRepresentation proxy for the sphere widget (which is the SphereWidgetRepresentation).

IntVectorProperty.name: Representation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the representation (i.e., appearance) of the sphere. Different representations are useful depending on the application.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The center position of the sphere. Note that this may adjust the direction from the handle to the center, as well as the radius of the sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The radius of sphere. Default is 0.5. Note that this may modify the position of the handle based on the handle direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: HandleVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The handle sits on the surface of the sphere and may be moved around the surface by picking (left mouse) and then moving. The position of the handle can be retrieved, this is useful for positioning cameras and lights. By default, the handle is turned off.

IntVectorProperty.name: HandleText
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable a label that displays the location of the handle in spherical coordinates (radius,theta,phi). The two angles, theta and phi, are displayed in degrees. Note that phi is measured from the north pole down towards the equator; and theta is the angle around the north/south axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialLine
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable a radial line segment that joins the center of the outer sphere and the handle.

ProxyProperty.name: Property
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the property used to determine the appearance of the axes.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this actor.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Bounds
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the bounds for this cube axes.

IntVectorProperty.name: FlyMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify a mode to control how the axes are drawn: either static, closest triad, furthest triad or outer edges in relation to the camera position.

IntVectorProperty.name: Inertia
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the inertial factor that controls how often (i.e, how many renders) the axes can switch position (jump from one axes to another).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CornerOffset
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify an offset value to "pull back" the axes from the corner at which they are joined to avoid overlap of axes labels. The "CornerOffset" is the fraction of the axis length to pull back.

StringVectorProperty.name: XTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the X axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: YTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the Y axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: ZTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the title for the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if X axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Y axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if Z axis is visible.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if ticks are visible on the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZAxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if minor ticks are visible on the Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: ZGridLines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify if grid lines are drawn parallel to Z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: TickLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the location of tick marks.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the edge color. This color is used to draw the edge for the polygonal data when EdgeVisibility is on.

IntVectorProperty.name: EdgeVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the edge visibility. This has any effect only when Visibility is On and Representation type if Surface.

IntVectorProperty.name: BackfaceCulling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off backface culling. When on, polygons facing away from the camera will not be drawn.

IntVectorProperty.name: FrontfaceCulling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn on/off frontface culling. When on, polygons facing towards from the camera will not be drawn.

IntVectorProperty.name: SynchronizeTileProperties
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set the render manager will synchronize the TileViewport and TileScale properties. This may not be desirable in cases where there's some other mechanism to set the tile dimensions eg. Tile displays.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableTiles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: To use tile displays, it is essential to set this property to 1.

SimpleStrategy.name: PolyDataStrategy
SimpleStrategy.Documentation: Representation stragegy can be used for poly data surface rendering with LOD. (Does not support client-server/parallel pipelines).

SimpleStrategy.name: UnstructuredGridStrategy
SimpleStrategy.Documentation: Representation strategy can be used for unstructured grid volume rendering. This differs from PolyDataStrategy in the LODDecimator. Here, we are using a GeometryFilter as the LODDecimator.

UniformGridParallelStrategy.name: UniformGridParallelStrategy
UniformGridParallelStrategy.Documentation: Representation strategy can be used for uniform grid volume rendering.

ImageDataParallelStrategy.name: ImageDataParallelStrategy
ImageDataParallelStrategy.Documentation: Representation strategy that can be used for image data. This strategy delivers the image data to the rendering process, hence not suitable for using when doing volume rendering.

BlockDeliveryStrategy.name: BlockDeliveryStrategy
BlockDeliveryStrategy.Documentation: Strategy used by BlockDeliveryStrategy for updating the pipeline.

Proxy.name: ViewBase
Proxy.Documentation: Defines common API for all views.

ProxyProperty.name: Representations
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Add representations to be rendered by this view.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewPosition
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Position of the view. This is useful in multiview configurations.

IntVectorProperty.name: GUISize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Total GUI size when using mutliple views. This includes the sizes of all view modules.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ViewTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The pipeline update time for this view. This gets passed to all representations added to this view.

StringVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

StringVectorProperty.name: AxisLabelFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

StringVectorProperty.name: AxisTitleFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

ViewProxy.name: BarChartView
ViewProxy.Documentation: View proxy for a bar char view.

StringVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

StringVectorProperty.name: AxisLabelFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

StringVectorProperty.name: AxisTitleFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

ViewProxy.name: XYPlotView
ViewProxy.Documentation: View proxy used for XY line plots.

StringVectorProperty.name: ChartTitleFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the chart title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

StringVectorProperty.name: AxisLabelFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

StringVectorProperty.name: AxisTitleFont
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the axis title font (familyname, size, bold, italics).

Proxy.name: RenderViewBase
Proxy.Documentation: This defines the properties/subproxies common to all render view subclasses.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the memory size threshold above which LOD will be used while rendering interactively.

IntVectorProperty.name: LODResolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the LOD resolution.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseTriangleStrips
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether triangle strips should be used when rendering polydata.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseLight
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable the LightKit.

Property.name: ResetCamera
Property.Documentation: Called to reset the camera using current data bounts.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOffscreenRenderingForScreenshots
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether offscreen rendering should be used during CaptureWindow calls.

RenderViewProxy.name: RenderView
RenderViewProxy.Documentation: Simplest render view without compositing/client-server support.

IceTCompositeViewProxy.name: IceTCompositeView
IceTCompositeViewProxy.Documentation: IceT Render View with compositing which can be used when no client-server delivery is required.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RemoteRenderThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering.

IntVectorProperty.name: ImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The image reduction factor used for compositing parallel images in InteractiveRender. ImageReductionFactor=1 implies no reduction at all.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the view size for this view module.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisableOrderedCompositing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Ordered compositing is used if any representation added to the view indicates that it requires ordered compositing. This flag can be set to true to override this behaviour.

IceTDesktopRenderViewProxy.name: IceTDesktopRenderView
IceTDesktopRenderViewProxy.Documentation: IceT Render View with compositing and client delivery mechanisms.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RemoteRenderThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering. This may alternatively thought as the remote render threshold, since when ever we use compositing, we render on the server.

IntVectorProperty.name: ImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The image reduction factor used for compositing parallel images in InteractiveRender. ImageReductionFactor=1 implies no reduction at all.

IntVectorProperty.name: SquirtLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the level for squirt compression to use when delivering rendered image to the client during interactive rendering.

IntVectorProperty.name: DisableOrderedCompositing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Ordered compositing is used if any representation added to the view indicates that it requires ordered compositing. This flag can be set to true to override this behaviour.

IceTMultiDisplayRenderViewProxy.name: IceTMultiDisplayRenderView
IceTMultiDisplayRenderViewProxy.Documentation: IceT Render View for tile displays.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CollectGeometryThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the threshold under which any geometry is collected on the client. When the data size exceeds the threshold, the client shows outlines instead of actual data. Size is in kilobytes.

IntVectorProperty.name: StillRenderImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the reduction factor to use when still rendering.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TileDisplayCompositeThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering on the tile display.

ClientServerRenderViewProxy.name: ClientServerRenderView
ClientServerRenderViewProxy.Documentation: Render View with client delivery mechanism. Does not support paralle rendering.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RemoteRenderThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering. This may alternatively thought as the remote render threshold, since when ever we use compositing, we render on the server.

IntVectorProperty.name: SquirtLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the level for squirt compression to use when delivering rendered image to the client during interactive rendering.

Proxy.name: ComparativeViewBase
Proxy.Documentation: Base interface for the ComparativeView. It has all the properties except the RootView subproxy.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the view size for this view module.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the time range for FilmStrip visualizations.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewUpdateMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property determines how individual frames of the comparative view will update when a source or filter displayed by the view is modified. When none is selected, no frames will update until the comparative view is explicity updated. When root is selected, the root frame will update but the other frames will not update until the comparative view is explicity updated. When all is selected, all frames will update.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property controls how the comparative view displays time. When show timesteps is off, the global time is displayed in each frame. When show timesteps is on, the comparative view displays different timesteps in each frame. When show timesteps is on, the global time is ignored.

ComparativeViewProxy.name: ComparativeRenderView
ComparativeViewProxy.Documentation: The is comparative view comprising of individual "RenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.

ComparativeViewProxy.name: ComparativeIceTDesktopRenderView
ComparativeViewProxy.Documentation: The is comparative view comprising of individual "IceTDesktopRenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.

ComparativeViewProxy.name: ComparativeIceTMultiDisplayRenderView
ComparativeViewProxy.Documentation: The is comparative view comprising of individual "IceTMultiDisplayRenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.

ComparativeViewProxy.name: ComparativeClientServerRenderView
ComparativeViewProxy.Documentation: The is comparative view comprising of individual "ClientServerRenderView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.

ComparativeViewProxy.name: ComparativeXYPlotView
ComparativeViewProxy.Documentation: The is comparative view comprising of individual "XYPlotView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.

ComparativeViewProxy.name: ComparativeBarChartView
ComparativeViewProxy.Documentation: The is comparative view comprising of individual "BarChartView" proxies for each panel in the comparative view grid.

TwoDRenderViewProxy.name: 2DRenderView
TwoDRenderViewProxy.Documentation: Simplest 2D render view without compositing/client-server support. Currently this view can only show image slices.

TwoDRenderViewProxy.name: 2DIceTCompositeView
TwoDRenderViewProxy.Documentation: IceT based 2D render view. Currently this view can only show image slices.

TwoDRenderViewProxy.name: 2DIceTDesktopRenderView
TwoDRenderViewProxy.Documentation: IceT based 2D render view. Currently this view can only show image slices.

TwoDRenderViewProxy.name: 2DIceTMultiDisplayRenderView
TwoDRenderViewProxy.Documentation: This is a 2D view comprising of a "IceTMultiDisplayRenderView" proxy (used in case of Tile displays).

TwoDRenderViewProxy.name: 2DClientServerRenderView
TwoDRenderViewProxy.Documentation: 2D view used in client-server mode without IceT (single node server).

SelectionRepresentationProxy.name: SelectionRepresentation
SelectionRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Proxy to show a selection as geometry.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: PointLabelVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of the cell labels for this representation. This is ignored if Visibility is 0.

IntVectorProperty.name: CellLabelVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation. This is ignored if Visibility is 0.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.

ImageSliceRepresentationProxy.name: ImageSliceRepresentation
ImageSliceRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show 2D images. If the input image has 3D extents, then this representation shows a single Z slice.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation. Must be a vtkImageData producer.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ColorAttributeType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the attribute type from where the scalars array is used. The scalar array name is specified using ColorArrayName. Note that if the indicated scalar array is not available, then the image data scalars are used.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array name to color by. If no array name is set, or choosen array is not available, then the image scalars are used by default.

IntVectorProperty.name: Slice
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current slice number. Slice number is used to load a 2D slice from a 3D input image. If the input image is 2D, then the slice number if ignored. The direction of the slice is determined by SliceMode.

IntVectorProperty.name: SliceMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines the direction of slicing to obtain a 2D slice from a 3D image.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array name to color by. Set it to empty string to use solid color.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup table to use for mapping scalars to color.

IntVectorProperty.name: ExtractedBlockIndex
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In case of multiblock datasets, choose the flat index of the dataset to volume render. The flat index must point to an unstructured grid dataset. If the input is not a multiblock dataset then this index is ignored.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: SelectionVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for the selection, if any.

IntVectorProperty.name: CubeAxesVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for the cube axes.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: GeometryRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show geometry as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UnstructuredGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show unstructured grid as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UniformGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show image data as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume/Slice.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

ClientDeliveryRepresentationProxy.name: ClientDeliveryRepresentationBase
ClientDeliveryRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This defines the common API used by all ClientDeliveryRepresentation proxies.

ProxyProperty.name: PostGatherHelper
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Used only when ReductionType is CUSTOM.

ProxyProperty.name: PreGatherHelper
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Used only when ReductionType is CUSTOM.

IntVectorProperty.name: PassThrough
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If set to a non-negative value, then produce results using only the node Id specified.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateProcessIds
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, the filter will generate vtkOriginalProcessIds arrays indicating the process id on which the cell/point was generated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseViewUpdateTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Visibility of the representation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseViewUpdateTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: The lookup table proxy used to color the bar chart.

StringVectorProperty.name: XArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to use on X axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: XArrayComponent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the array component for X-axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: YArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to use on Y axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: YArrayComponent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the array component for Y-axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Visibility of the representation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseViewUpdateTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseYArrayIndex
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set array index is plotted on the X axis.

StringVectorProperty.name: YArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to use on Y axis (arrayname, legendname, enabled, inlegend, r, g, b, thickness, linestyle, axesindex, component)

StringVectorProperty.name: ArrayInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Internal property used to provide list of available arrays for the ArraySelectionDomain on the YArrayStatus property.

StringVectorProperty.name: XArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to use on X axis. This is used only if UseYCellArrayIndex is set to 0

BlockDeliveryRepresentationProxy.name: BlockDeliveryRepresentation
BlockDeliveryRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation used to deliver blocks of data to the client.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: CacheSize
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum number of blocks to cache on the client.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseViewUpdateTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.

BlockDeliveryRepresentationProxy.name: SelectionBlockDeliveryRepresentation
BlockDeliveryRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation used to deliver blocks of data to the client. This representation delivers a subset of selection pertinent to the block that would have been delivered if we were using a BlockDeliveryRepresentation.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: CacheSize
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum number of blocks to cache on the client.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseViewUpdateTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.

IntVectorProperty.name: SelectionOnly
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to 1, this representations shows only the selected cells (or points). The change will effect only after calling Update(). Note that changing this will clean all cache.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Corners
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the corners of the outline when in Oriented mode, the values are supplied as 8*3 double values.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: BoxWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the the box widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the box 3D widget.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: SphereWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the the sphere widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.

TextSourceRepresentationProxy.name: TextSourceRepresentation
TextSourceRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy used to show text.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseViewUpdateTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.

DataLabelRepresentationProxy.name: DataLabelRepresentation
DataLabelRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation used to add labels to points/cells of any dataset.

CubeAxesRepresentationProxy.name: CubeAxesRepresentation
CubeAxesRepresentationProxy.Documentation: CubeAxesRepresentation is a representation for any dataobject which simply shows an axes along the bounding box of the dataobject.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Input around which the bound box is to be shown.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UpdateTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This time is not used unless UseViewUpdateTime is off.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseViewUpdateTime
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates if the representation should use the view time to update the pipeline or use "UpdateTime" set on the representation instead.
